name: Perfectly Normal Town Game That Will Not Be Weird In Any Way Shape or Form
name_original: Perfectly Normal Town Game That Will Not Be Weird In Any Way Shape or Form
description:
Welcome to Perfectly Normal Town Game That Will Not Be Weird In Any Way Shape or Form! Here we have a lot of "good" relationships, epic action and more! This game is a demo, and I'll keep production as soon as I can. A top 10 visual novel!

Yes, also please tell me of any boogs.
